song_name: All That Glitters Isn t Gold
lyrics:
Yesterday, I met a boy so fine
Right away I knew he'd captivate my mind
So strong, the kind you dream about
Bring it together, we could really scream and shout
I showed him to some friends of mine
They said "Girl, don't waste your time
That boy's no good for you
Listen, girl, I'm telling you
I think it's time you knew that"
All that glitters isn't gold
Everything you see
Isn't what it seems to be
[No, oh, oh]
Oh, no oh
All that glitters isn't gold
Sometimes we make the mistake
Of thinking everything that looks good is great
We all seem to go for what shines
And then we leave all of the other things behind
Some people always give a show
'cause it's the only way they know
But you don't have to play that game because the
Only thing that matters
Is what's inside your heart
All that glitters isn't gold
Everything you see
Isn't what it seems to be
[No, oh, oh]
Oh, no oh
All that glitters isn't gold
[oh, oh]
So here's my advice to you
[oh, oh]
Everything you see's not always true
[oh, oh]
Take the time to look inside
And find out for yourself
What's really on their minds
All that glitters isn't gold
Everything you see
Isn't what it seems to be
[No, oh, oh]
Oh, no oh
All that glitters isn't gold
